OUR CLOUD

Downtime and slowness are disasters for every website. Unlike traditional hosting with multiple points of failure, our high availability cloud hosting is immune to hardware failures and constrains.

We built our infrastructure on a distributed self-healing cloud designed to accelerate performance, increase security and eliminate single points of failure in order to maximize reliability and deliver 100% uptime for your websites that is impossible on traditional web hosting setups.

Our cloud shared hosting platform is perfect for both individuals and businesses looking for an affordable cloud hosting service with 100% uptime and build their websites on a fast and reliable web hosting service.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQ)

Q: Can you migrate my websites for me?
A: We can migrate your websites, files, databases, emails, settings etc. from most cPanel hosts for free!

Q: Do you have a moneyback guarantee?
A: We have an Anytime Moneyback Guarantee where you can request for a refund at any time if you feel like canceling your service.

Q: Do you have reviews for me to check out?
A: CloudHulk is a sister brand of Limenex, which has been providing high performance web hosting services since 2010 with dozens of positive reviews from our happy customers. CloudHulk was recently launched as a cloud-centric brand focused on business cloud hosting solutions. Nonetheless, CloudHulk is closely linked to Limenex and shares the same management and high level of service expected from our customers.

Have a question for us? No problem! Contact us here and we will be glad to assist you!
